#summary Project Tomat3007 - Arduino Uno with 433Mhz (Sender+Receiver) and Networkinterface
===The Project:===
I would like control all my power sockets and room lights over Website with 
 * a normal PC
 * a Smartphone
 * something that can display Websites

Important:

All must be
 * low cost
 * full removeable (if you change your flat or house)
 * and useable for normal users (without skills in developing or hardware)


===Components===
 * 433 Mhz Receiver ([http://www.watterott.com/de/RF-Link-2400bps-Empfaenger-434MHz Link])
 * 433 Mhz Sender ([http://www.watterott.com/de/RF-Link-Sender-434MHz Link])
 * Arduino Uno Rev. 3 ([http://www.watterott.com/de/Arduino-Uno Link])
 * some Jumper Wires ([http://www.watterott.com/de/Low-Cost-Jumper-Wires-fuer-Breadboards-70-Stueck Link])
 * a Case for all Components
